coffees.name: Pour Over
coffees.description: A manual brewing method where hot water is poured over coffee grounds.

coffees.name: Vienna
coffees.description: A Spanish-style coffee consisting of equal parts espresso and cream.

coffees.name: Affogato
coffees.description: A dessert-style coffee with a scoop of vanilla ice cream drowned in espresso.

coffees.name: Ristretto
coffees.description: A short and intense shot of espresso brewed with less water.

coffees.name: Lungo
coffees.description: A long shot of espresso brewed with more water for a lighter flavor.

coffees.name: French Press
coffees.description: Coarsely ground coffee steeped in hot water and pressed with a plunger.

coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: Smooth espresso combined with steamed milk and a light foam top.

coffees.name: Flat White
coffees.description: Similar to a latte but with less foam, providing a stronger coffee taste.

coffees.name: Macchiato
coffees.description: Espresso 'stained' with a small amount of steamed milk.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: A decadent blend of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

coffees.name: Irish Coffee
coffees.description: Hot coffee with Irish whiskey, sugar, and a layer of cream on top.

coffees.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
coffees.description: Strong brewed coffee mixed with sweetened condensed milk and ice.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: Espresso topped with a thick layer of steamed milk foam.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: Espresso diluted with hot water, similar in strength to drip coffee.

coffees.name: Turkish Coffee
coffees.description: Finely ground coffee brewed with water and sugar in a small pot.

coffees.name: AeroPress
coffees.description: A manual coffee brewing method using air pressure to extract flavor.

coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: A strong and bold coffee with a rich crema layer.

coffees.name: Frappuccino
coffees.description: A blended iced coffee drink with milk, sugar, and flavorings.
